title: Covid deaths reach 4,000 a day in Brazil, bringing hospitals to breaking point
content:
1. Covid deaths reach 4,000 a day in Brazil, bringing hospitals to breaking point  NBC News
  2. Brazil's COVID-19 death toll could outpace the U.S.  Reuters
  3. 'A biological Fukushima': Brazil COVID-19 deaths on track to pass worst of U.S. wave  Yahoo News
  4. Brazil COVID-19 Update: Mutant virus wreaks havoc, 4195 people died in 24 hrs| Coronavirus Pandemic  WION
  5. Bolsonaro shrugs off criticism he is 'genocidal' as Brazil reports record 4,000 daily deaths  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ブラジルではコヴィドによる死亡者が1日に4,000人に達し、病院は限界に達している。
